title: New: Photay â€“ Static At The Summit
content:
Have released my favourite album of 2012, with his self-titled masterpiece, NY based producer Evan Shornstein aka Photay, has dropped a free download of a new track to celebrate 400 downloads of said album.

Static At The Summit is a glitchy track, without the sort of percussion dominance found on his debut LP, but still showcasing the immense talent of this unique producer. With 400 downloads (of what is a free album) being a criminally low number for such a fantastic record, check out the new track below, then grab the full LP here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
